resources.string: Larry J\'s BBQ Cafe
Settings

We bring the taste of Texas barbeque to Boston! Our mission is to offer an amazing, lip smacking, finger licking and life changing bbq experience. Our motto is "quality, quantity and consistency". We believe bbq is a great comfort food: quintessential American Favorite.

Where to Find Us:
LARRY J'S BBQ CAFE
600 D Street
Seaport Boston, MA 02210
Tel:617.348.9800
Fax: 617.348.9806
